General.Name: Krakchemia SA
General.Description: Krakchemia S.A. engages in the wholesale trade of chemical products in Poland and internationally. The company distributes plastic raw materials, including polyethylene, polypropylene, styrene fibers, construction plastics, mineal fillers, masterbatches, and assisting agents. It also offers packaging films. In addition, the company provides chemical materials; chemical reagents; filters, standards, and chemical tests; laboratory glass products; and HPLC, GC, and UPLC chromatographic columns. It also operates an online shop. The company was formerly known as KrakChemia " Hurt S.A. and changed its name to Krakchemia S.A. in November 2004. The company was founded in 1945 and is based in Kraków, Poland.

1.Name: Mr. Wladyslaw  Kardasinski
1.Title: Sec. of the Supervisory Board & Member of Supervisory Board
